titleStmt.title: A short way to a lasting settlement shewing, I. that parliaments are not infallible, II. who are their great enemies, III. how to redeem their reputation : with a warning to all loyal gentlemen and freeholders, in a letter to fanaticus ignoramus.
titleStmt.author: Womock, Laurence, 1612-1685.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"Attributed to Womock by Halkett & Laing". cf. NUC pre-1956.
